name: Rusty Blade: Chicken Rescue
description:
Your chickens have been stolen by the local skeletons. You kinda miss their eggs and really miss their feathery cuddles, so you resolve to get them back at all costs!

Run and jump - Arrow keys
Sword - 'C' or Space key.

Open source project made with Godot - view source here!

Made for A Game By It's Cover 2017. Cover art here.
